sen.j: 藤原 顕綱（ふじわら の あきつな、長元2年（1029年） - 康和5年6月27日 (旧暦)（1103年8月1日））は平安時代後期の廷臣、歌人。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Akitsuna (1029 - August 1, 1103) was a retainer of Imperial Court and poet who lived in the latter half of the Heian period.

sen.e: Therefore, he had a close relationship with Emperor Gosanjo, and it is said that his second son, FUJIWARA no Arisuke, was actually an illegitimate child of Emperor Gosanjo.
